# Randomness {-}

One critical component of simulation is the random process used to generate data. To help you begin to understand randomness, watch Stephan Dreiseitl's TEDxMCInnsbruck talk:  [Math and the Art of Describing Randomness](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j1dKvoa2ITw) 

[What is Random](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rIy0xY99a0)
